# WaterMass
**Water mass classification, TS- and section plots using ggplot2 to aid analysis of oceanographic data. R package version `r packageVersion("WaterMass")`**

This package contains water mass classification, temperature-salinity-, and section plot functions from [PlotSvalbard](https://github.com/MikkoVihtakari/PlotSvalbard). These functions are more up-to-date in this package, which may eventually be usbmitted to CRAN.
